bibl.title: Christianity and Monasticism in Middle Egypt. Al-Minya and Asyut.

bibl.seg: Ashraf Nageh & Mary Kupelian, An Overview of Rock-cut Coptic Sites in Asyut.
Gawdat Gabra & Hany N. Takla (edd.), Christianity and Monasticism in Middle Egypt. Al-Minya and Asyut (Cairo - New York, 2015) pp. 309-319, 3 figg.

Introduction. - Locations of Reference Sites in Asyut. - General Geological Setting. - Dedication of the Monasteries. - Review of Historians' Accounts. - Description of the Churches. - Dating. - Conclusions.
